mapper.select: SELECT tt.id, tt.`name` FROM tb_tag tt LEFT JOIN tb_article_tag tat on tt.id = tat.tag_id LEFT JOIN tb_article ta on ta.id = tat.article_id WHERE ta.id = #{id}

select t.id, t.name, ifnull( tt.count, 0 ) as `count` from tb_tag t left join ( select count(*) AS count, tag_id from tb_article_tag group by tag_id ) tt on t.id = tt.tag_id where `count` != 0 order by count desc

select t.id, t.name, ifnull( tt.count, 0 ) as count from tb_tag t left join ( select count(*) AS count, tag_id from tb_article_tag group by tag_id ) tt on t.id = tt.tag_id order by count desc limit #{page}, #{limit}
